item.title: Hiding secrets in public view
item.description: Some time ago, I got intrigued by an article on the Register, finding out about the Baconian cipher. I started writing some code, initially implementing Baconian cipher codecs, which encode text to As and Bs and decode them back to text. This was not enough, though, so I thought of implementing a steganographer, which would help hiding these As and Bs into text, mapping As to lowercase characters and Bs to uppercase characters.
